trans-unit.source: When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando un servizio che deriva dalla classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> rileva un'eccezione che non può gestire, può chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> per indicare al motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro di generare l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il servizio passa l'oggetto <xref:System.Guid> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro e l'oggetto <xref:System.Exception> associato a questo evento nella chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Il motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro incapsula questi parametri in un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> e genera l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Da un sottoscrittore dell'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> è possibile leggere la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> e la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> per ottenere le informazioni associate a un particolare evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione non gestita dal servizio.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> che rappresenta l'eccezione non gestita dal servizio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro associato all'eccezione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro associato all'eccezione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> è equivalente all'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro associato all'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>.
